com.quorum.tessera.transaction

Interface EncryptedTransactionDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EncryptedTransactionDAOImpl

    public interface EncryptedTransactionDAO
    A data store for transactions that need to be retrieved later

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(MessageHash hash)
      Deletes a transaction that has the given hash as its digest
      List<EncryptedTransaction> retrieveAllTransactions()
      Retrieves a list of all transactions stored in the database
      Optional<EncryptedTransaction> retrieveByHash(MessageHash hash)
      Retrieve a transaction based on its hash
      EncryptedTransaction save(EncryptedTransaction entity)
      Save a new Encrypted Transaction All fields are required to be non-null on the entity

    • Method Detail

      • save

        EncryptedTransaction save(EncryptedTransaction entity)
        Save a new Encrypted Transaction All fields are required to be non-null on the entity
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be persisted
        Returns:
        The entity that was persisted

      • retrieveByHash

        Optional<EncryptedTransaction> retrieveByHash(MessageHash hash)
        Retrieve a transaction based on its hash
        Parameters:
        hash - the hash of the transaction to retrieve
        Returns:
        the encrypted transaction with the given hash

      • retrieveAllTransactions

        List<EncryptedTransaction> retrieveAllTransactions()
        Retrieves a list of all transactions stored in the database
        Returns:
        The list of all rows in the database

        Throws:
